resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="standard",
    filter=[
        "lowercase",
        {
            "type": "synonym_graph",
            "synonyms": [
                "pc => personal computer",
                "computer, pc, laptop"
            ]
        }
    ],
    text="Check how PC synonyms work",
)
print(resp)
